import React, { Component } from 'react' import { Input, Card, Table, Drawer, Form, Button, Col, Row, Space, message, Radio } from 'antd'; import { PlusOutlined } from '@ant-design/icons'; import LinkButton from '../../../components/LinkButton'; export default class PlatForm extends Component { myForm = React.createRef() state = { visible: 0 }; // 打开添加抽屉 showAddUser = () => { this.setState({ visible: 1 }) } // 关闭抽屉 onClose = () => { this.setState({ visible: 0 }) this.myForm.current.resetFields() } // 添加用户 addUser = () => { message.success('添加成功') this.setState({ visible: 0 }) this.myForm.current.resetFields() } // 打开编辑的抽屉 showUpdateUser = () => { this.setState({ visible: 2 }) } updateUser = () => { message.success('编辑成功') this.setState({ visible: 0 }) this.myForm.current.resetFields() } render() { const { visible } = this.state const columns = [ { title: '姓名', dataIndex: 'name', key: '1', align: 'center', }, { title: '身份证', dataIndex: 'idCard', key: '2', align: 'center', }, { title: '手机号码', dataIndex: 'phone', key: '3', align: 'center', }, { title: '操作', key: '4', render: () => ( 编辑 ), align: 'center' }, ]; const dataSource = [ { key: '1', phone: '123456', name: '李四', state: '启用', }, ] return (
} type="primary" onClick={this.showAddUser}>新增 } > {/* 新增的抽屉 */}
启用 禁用
{/* 编辑的抽屉 */}
启用 禁用
) } }
